davinci.data

Interface IDimension<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the data type within this dimension
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dimension

    public interface IDimension<V>
    This interface define a single data dimension. Each data may contain
    multiple dimensions. Each value in the dimension can be seen as an
    attribute in the IElement.
    Author:
    Nan Cao
    See Also:
    Dimension, IData
